abstract: Steven Banks, official in charge of New York City homeless outreach, accuses State Office of Temporary and Disability Assistance of political sabotage after office reports gang rape at city shelter; police investigation shows rape never happened; incident points to acrimony between Mayor Bill de Blasio and Gov Andrew Cuomo, which has spilled over into city bureaucracies.
lead_paragraph: A series of letters shows a poisoned relationship between city and state officials over the shelter system.

headline.main: Tensions Over New York’s Homeless Shelters Explode After Disputed Rape Accusation
headline.print_headline: Tensions Over Homeless Shelters Explode After an Allegation of Rape

snippet: A series of letters shows a poisoned relationship between city and state officials over the shelter system.

keywords.value: Office of Temporary and Disability Assistance
keywords.name: organizations
